name: Inline (itch)
description:
The game was designed as a mobile-first game. To really enjoy it, please play it on Android.

Inline is a game about lines and a simple mechanic. The gameplay is very simple, tap the screen when the color of the horizontal bar, the cursor hover the same color on the line.

Simple, eh? Try to make the highest score possible. When your score increase you will encounter differents events in the game hardening your journey toward the highest score possible.
